analysis.intraday_levels: SPY: Testing $700 call wall (active hedging, 1.4% resistance); support at $680 (active) and $690 max pain. QQQ: Testing $630 call wall (active, 1.0% resistance); consolidation expected near $623-$624 max pain zone. Watch for breakout above $700 SPY or breakdown below $680 for directional confirmation.
analysis.swing_levels: SPY: Resistance $700-$710 (call wall active, then dormant resistance at $730, $750); Support breakdown risk toward $680 (active) then $645 (dormant, 6.6% away). QQQ: Resistance $630-$640 (active call walls); support $590-$585 (dormant put wall at 6.2% away). Most likely 1-5 day scenario: Consolidation with mild downside pressure; silver technical breakdown likely precedes broader equity retracement if exhaustion thesis activates.
